caption:
This photograph shows an elderly woman engaged in an activity, likely playing cards. She is seated at a table and focused on the cards in front of her. She wears a red cable-knit cardigan over a white blouse decorated with a floral pattern. Her hair is styled up and secured with a pink ribbon.

She is wearing round glasses and appears to be concentrating deeply on her task. The environment around her suggests she is in a communal room, possibly a senior center, as the surrounding area is populated with other individuals who appear to be engaged in similar leisure activities. The mood of the scene is calm and concentrated.

This detailed scene allows for an appreciation of a moment of everyday life, highlighting the simplicity and tranquility of the activity.
title: Senior citizens find that New Ulm, Minnesota, is a good place to retire.  There is a close community responsibility towards older people no matter what their financial position might be.  Older citizens and those unable to care for themselves physically are cared for in two community facilities, alexander home and Highland manor.  New ulm is a county seat trading center of 13,000 in a farming area of south central Minnesota founded by a german immigrant land company in 1854
